channel.title: Maple Story and Server [Urgent?]
channel.description:
Don't post if you've know clue what things like a RunServer are..
Okay, I'm just asking is it bad to run my server - not actual MoparScape, just the DOS-like runserver thing so people can play on my server without me having to be on it. Is it bad to run it while I also have up on my screen (full) Maple Story which is another Online game?
~~~~~~~~~~~ if you're wondering why I ask this then read:
I got bored and me and some friends decided to play some other online game.
So here's the thing, when I was playing sometimes it minimizes [it's a full screen game] When I'm on the desktop either my RunServer is just gone outa' nowhere or I look in it and see the server crashed.
If I try and start it back up right after it quickly closes saying something with "Fatal Error" If I exit Maple Story and start it up it works fine and I can turn Maple back on again.
Anyone know why it does this and if it's safe to run both?..
Help extremely appreciated =D

item.title: Maple Story and Server [Urgent?]
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

Just play one game at a time lol. I don’t think there is anything to do…

~Thanks, Mike

Sincerely,
XmasterX123

not yet released to the public
